title: Biggest of Three Numbers
code:
#!/bin/bash

echo "Enter the first number:"
read num1

echo "Enter the second number:"
read num2

echo "Enter the third number:"
read num3

# Initialize the biggest variable to the first number
biggest=$num1

# Check if the second number is bigger than the current biggest
if [ $num2 -gt $biggest ]
then
  biggest=$num2
fi

# Check if the third number is bigger than the current biggest
if [ $num3 -gt $biggest ]
then
  biggest=$num3
fi

echo "The biggest number is: $biggest"

title: Armstrong Number
code:
#!/bin/bash

echo "Enter a number:"
read num

# Count the number of digits
n=${#num}

# Initialize the sum variable
sum=0

# Iterate over each digit
for (( i=0; i<$n; i++ ))
do
  # Extract the digit at position i
digit=${num:i:1}

  # Add the digit raised to the power of n to the sum
  sum=$(( $sum + $digit ** $n ))
done

# Check if the sum is equal to the original number
if [ $sum -eq $num ]
then
  echo "$num is an Armstrong number"
else
  echo "$num is not an Armstrong number"
fi

title: Reverse the Number
code:
#!/bin/bash

 echo "Enter a number:"
 read num
 
 # Initialize the reversed variable
 reversed=0
 
 # Loop until the number becomes 0
 while [ $num -ne 0 ]
 do
 # Extract the last digit of the number
 digit=$(( $num % 10 ))
 
 # Append the digit to the reversed number
 reversed=$(( $reversed * 10 + $digit ))
 
 # Remove the last digit from the number
 num=$(( $num / 10 ))
 done
 
 echo "The reversed number is: $reversed"

title: Fibonacci Series
code:
#!/bin/bash

echo "Enter the number of terms in the Fibonacci series:"
read n

# Initialize the first two terms
a=0
b=1

echo "The Fibonacci series is:"

# Loop to generate the series
for (( i=0; i<$n; i++ ))
do
 echo -n "$a "

 
 next=$(( $a + $b ))

 # Update the values of a and b for the next iteration
 a=$b
 b=$next
done

echo

title: Sum of Series
code:
#!/bin/bash

sum=0
i=1
echo "Enter the number of terms:"
read n
echo "Enter the numbers:"
while [ $i -le $n ]
do
  read a
  sum=`expr $a + $sum`
  i=`expr $i + 1`
done
echo "Sum is $sum"
